title: Discovery
subtitle: 26 tasks — Discovery through Court Filing Notice

tasks.label: Draft Plaintiff's Discovery Responses
tasks.sla: 30 days from complaint filed
tasks.function: Once completed update discovery tracker in Litify, submit to attorney for review, mark complete
tasks.notes: Draft and send to attroney for review, update discovery tracker

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 1
tasks.sla: 10am on the 31st day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V1, send SMS 1, send Email 1, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 1 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 2
tasks.sla: 1pm on the 32nd day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V2, send SMS 2, send Email 2, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 2 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 3
tasks.sla: 4pm on the 33rd day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V3, send SMS 3, send Email 3, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 3 Complete"

tasks.label: Send Discovery Appointment / Contact Letter
tasks.sla: Automation
tasks.function: If no contact by the beginning of the 16th day, the letter is automatically sent by the system

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 4
tasks.sla: 10am on the 45 day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V4, send SMS 4, send Email 4, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 4 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 5
tasks.sla: 1pm on the 46 day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V5, send SMS 55, send Email 5, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 5 Complete"

tasks.label: Call Disovery Appt Attempt 6
tasks.sla: 4pm on the 47 day after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V6, send SMS 6, send Email 6, mark "Call Discovery Appointment Attempt 6 Complete"

tasks.label: Send Discovery Appointment / Contact Letter 2
tasks.sla: Automation
tasks.function: If no contact by the beginning of the 47th day, the letter is automatically sent by the system

tasks.label: Discovery Appointment
tasks.sla: On day 49 from after the complaint is filed
tasks.function: If still no completed appointment, system automatically sends alert and notification to management that this is blocked

tasks.label: Discovery Appointment
tasks.sla: No later than 5 days from the day the conversation happens, or if needed, escalate to Management, mark complete
tasks.function: If completed, mark "Complete"
tasks.notes:
Discovery Appointment Agenda (Client Meeting)

0) Opening and expectations (2–3 min)
Introduce team + roles (who does what, how to reach you)
Purpose of today: “Confirm facts, protect the claim, strengthen the case, and set expectations.”
Confidentiality + honesty: remind them accuracy matters more than “sounding good”
Meeting structure: “I’ll ask detailed questions, then we’ll confirm next steps.”

1) Client goals + priorities (3–5 min)
“What are your top concerns right now?”
“What outcome...

tasks.label: Clent Profile Scoring
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from most recent client communication
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
It would be required that these scores be re-scored or a “No Change” score entered, every time a case manager progressed a case. Again, this is only for the case profile. These dials would be shown in a dashboard at the top of every matter panel view. 

Any thoughts? Additions? Revisions? 

“What...

Input all needed info for below: 

“What to do” box: 
•        “If Demand-Ready % < X → add demand sprint + records chase”
•        “If gaps > X → treatment monitoring protocol triggers”
•        “If liability score low → early lit evaluation”

“Top 10 Action List” widget
•        A live list that updates daily:
o        Oldest demands not sent
o        Highest value cases missing records
o        Top cases with expiring deadlines
o        Top 10 stalled negotiations
o        Top 10 clients at...

tasks.label: Liability Profile Scoring System
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from most recent client communication
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
Defense Pressure & Settlement Leverage Model

Purpose

This model measures:

1. How difficult it is for the defense to escape fault
2. How predictable a jury outcome would be
3. How expensive and risky it is for the carrier to fight

When measured consistently, these scores become powerful...

Liability setup and scoring

tasks.label: Policy & Collectability Scoring System
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from most recent client communication
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
Transportation 
No insurance, auto or health - will it work to give a letter of protection (LOP)

Recovery Power & Payment Predictability Model

Purpose

This system measures:
•        How much insurance money is realistically available
•        How difficult it will be to access it
•        How...

Policy setup and scoring

tasks.label: Treatment Strength Index (TSI)
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from most recent client communication
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
A structured way to rate the **quality, seriousness, credibility, and profitability** of medical treatment.

You can use 1–5 scales, color ratings, or weighted points.

Body parts are experiencing pain
Pain levels
New injury or an excacerbated injury
Fracture or a scar



The 5 Master Treatment...

Treatment setup and scoring

tasks.label: Comprehensive Case Performance Index (CPI)
tasks.sla: To be completed 1 hour from most recent client communication
tasks.function: Complete and then mark complete
tasks.notes:
“How strong is this file as a business asset?”
This index measures how efficiently, profitably, and strategically viable the case is — independent of liability, policy, treatment, or client personality.

The 7 Pillars of the Case Performance Index
Each scored 0–20
Total = 0–140
Converted to 0–100...

Case scoring

tasks.label: Finalize Discovery Responses
tasks.sla: 2 days after appointment with client
tasks.function: Completing discovery responses, assigning to para with additional notes and instructions

tasks.label: Approve Discovery Responses
tasks.sla: 6 days after completion of the discovery appt
tasks.function: Review complaint, mark complete

tasks.label: Finalize discovery responses serve upon defense counsel
tasks.sla: 10 days after defendant files answer
tasks.function: Finalize and service via email, save final copy in Plaintiff's Discovery, mark completed, update discovery tracker, add service date to Matter Dates

tasks.label: 10 Day Good Faith Letter
tasks.sla: 60 days after answer is filed and plaintiff's discovery is served
tasks.function: Automated

tasks.label: Draft Motion to Compel Disc Responses
tasks.sla: 70 days after answer is filed and plaintiff's discovery is served
tasks.function: Court Submission, Saved filed copy in Motions Folder, Calendar the Return date, mark completed

tasks.label: Report on outcome of the motion to compel. Choose if granted, denied, withdrawn
tasks.sla: 3 hours from recieving the order
tasks.function: Report in Litify on outcome of the motion to compel. Choose if granted, denied, withdrawn, mark complete
tasks.notes: Report on court order or motion outcome

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 1
tasks.sla: 1 hour from Manager approval
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 2
tasks.sla: 3 hours from Manager approval
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Supportive Doc Production 3
tasks.sla: 5 hours from Manager approval
tasks.function: Draft and process supportive doc production, mark complete

tasks.label: Court discovery end date reminder notice, everytime we recieve one, each time we get one the upload and input needs t...
tasks.sla: 1 business day from notice reciept
tasks.function: Once recieved, mark complete, upload to Litify, mark complete, input the discovery end date, mark complete
tasks.notes: Inputing discovery end date reminder notice
